Name: Rixos Premium Tekirova
Description:
Rixos Premium Tekirova offers fabulous family holidays combining history, culture, quality and luxury. Tekirova sits facing the magnificent Mediterranean Sea with Mount Olympus rising majestically behind the resort creating colourful holidays in every shade of blue and green from the brilliant sky to the shimmering waters and lush scenery. The Turkish Riviera, with its miles of golden sands, hours of sunshine and beautiful azure waters, offers a wealth of activities.


Complimentary roundtrip shuttle to The Land Of Legends Theme Park (LOL)
• VIP entrance to the park from special gate
• A Great Opportunity to Experience Spectacular Night Shows and a Unique Setting of an Open-Air Shopping Conditions:
• Guests will enjoy unlimited free access to The Land of Legends Theme Park.
• Hotel – Park – Hotel transfers shuttles during the day free of charge. Please contact guest relations for shuttle times.
• The All Inclusive – All Exclusive concept is available only in Rixos Premium Tekirova only, not valid for the park.
• Some services, food & beverages in The Land of Legends Theme Park are subject to a charge.
• Theme Park opening and closing dates are subject to change through The Land of Legends Management.
• Land of Legends Theme Park Aqualand does not operate in winter season. 
• Operation days of theme park may be changed or cancelled depending on weather conditions.
• Depending on seasonal and operational conditions the operational status of our units may change

Address.Street: Tekirova Beldesi P K 137 Kemer Tekirova, 137

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
